sec.p: This article has been prepared from the master’s thesis of Hasan Huseyin IPCAK supported by TUBITAK “2210-C Domestic Graduate Scholarship Programme for Priority Areas” and EGETAV company in Izmir/Turkey. He is also thankful to TUBITAK for financial support during my thesis period. Besides, the authors gratefully acknowledge financial support from Faculty Member Training Program (ÖYP).
